entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Elbow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elbow 06:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: WNW 37 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning then diminishing to 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
